recipes.title: Lemon & Herb Roast Chicken
recipes.description: A succulent whole chicken roasted with fresh herbs, zesty lemon, and garlic, perfect for a comforting family dinner.
steps: Pat the chicken dry with kitchen paper and place in a roasting tin.
Rub olive oil over the skin, then season with salt, pepper, rosemary and thyme.
Stuff the cavity with the lemon halves and garlic.
Roast for 1 hour 25 minutes, basting halfway, until the juices run clear.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir‑Fry with Tofu
recipes.description: A vibrant medley of seasonal vegetables and crisp tofu tossed in a light soy‑ginger sauce, ready in under 30 minutes.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a large wok over medium‑high heat.
Add tofu cubes and fry until golden on all sides, then set aside.
Stir‑fry garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
Add pepper, courgette, sugar‑snap peas and carrot; cook for 4‑5 minutes.
Return tofu to the wok, pour over soy sauce and toss to coat.
Scatter spring onions over the top and serve immediately with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A rich, slow‑simmered beef and tomato sauce served over al dente spaghetti for a timeless Italian favourite.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan and sauté onion, carrot and celery for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and beef mince; cook until browned.
Stir in tomato purée, chopped tomatoes, stock, oregano and bay leaf.
Season, bring to a simmer, then cover and cook on low heat for 40 minutes.
Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to packet instructions.
Discard bay leaf, spoon sauce over spaghetti and serve.
